post: And we all know that the result from the VP8 Image Analyzer show that the image is encoded with 3 D dimensional properties. No paintings or photographs in the world can produce a 3 D image using the VP* Analyzer. This proves its not a painting..
title: Observations Consistent with a Medieval Artist?
